DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if metformin therapy prevents fetal macrosomy in gestational diabetes mellitus to the same extent as insulin therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Metformin Versus Insulin in the Treatment of Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: gestational diabetes mellitus diagnosed between 1234 pregnancy weeks if normoglycemia is not reached with diet hypertension with pharmacological treatment or preeclampsia multiple pregnancy liver or kidney disease
